_sText:
Knife_jail_balance_ultimate (knife_jail_balance1 was a beta - bugs in knife_jail_balance2 fixed - knife_jail_balance_final has been updated)
Mapped by MaelstroMGooF
The objective of this map is simply to eliminate the opposition through any means possible.  

RECOMMENDED SERVER SETTINGS: 
Buy time should be between 5secs & 10secs.  
Round Time should be more than 150secs
Gravity, Movement speed & etc should be set to default

READING THE FOLLOWING IS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

Features:
Temporary Spawn Zone:
After about 15 secs, the spawn platforms will fade away & disappear all together.  Info plates will disappear after 5 secs from start of round.  
 
Jail:
If you fall off into the void, you will be teleported to jail.  If the entire team ends up in the jail, they will be executed.  Prisoners can be released from jail via the standing in the appropriate "Free" Zone at the enemies' spawn.  People cannot shoot into/out of the jail.  

One on One Arena:
Prisoners from opposing team can fight each other one on one by pressing the appropriate button whilst in jail (Only one person from each team can be in the One on One fight!)

Special Zones with colours & symbols:
Red with lightning bolt - Hurts the player
Blue with arrow - Pushes the player in the direction of the arrow
Green with "CT" & Stars - Teleports CT's to a Yellow Pad (Does nothing to T's)
Yellow with "T" & Stars - Teleports T's to a Green Pad (Does nothing to CT's)
Orange with plus signs - Heals the player
Purple with question marks - Random Pad

Random Pad:
The Random Pad will give you one of several possible effects.  The random pad IS THE ONLY WAY to get guns.  The effects & their probabilities are:
Give Glock & teleport to a random location - 1 in 4
Give Dualies & teleport to jail - 1 in 6
Shake the level & teleport to a random location - 1 in 6
Do nothing & teleport to a random location or jail - 1 in 8
Give a Grenade & teleport to jail - 1 in 10
Give Mac10 & teleport to jail - 1 in 10
Heal 50hp & teleport to a random location - 1 in 10
Hurt 50hp & teleport to a random location - 1 in 10
Ignite & teleport to a random location (usually lethal) - 1 in 10
Give Awp & teleport to jail - 1 in 50 

Controllable Hazards:
Lasers - these can have their targets swapped via buttons in the jail
Rotators - these can reverse direction via buttons in the jail
Push Beam Turrets - these can be controlled via a platform above the turret - hold down the appropriate button to move the beam in that direction - The beam will push any players it touches & knock them into jail - IF the beam hits a friendly or enemy while you are controlling it, you will be pushed off the turret contoller into jail (This was implemented due to the turret being too good, now the primary purpose of it is to put it in an advantageous location to hinder enemy movements rather than push them off)

Uncontrollable Hazards:
Moving Pusher/Hurter - Will push you off the edge if it doesn't kill you first
Disappearing/Reappearing Platforms - Transparent & will disappear & reappear entirelly at random.  

Round Going too Long Hazard:
This hazard will appear at the bottom of the level & slowly move up, engulfing the level - It's big & red & will kill you instantly - This hazard is basically a kind of sudden death mode & drastically speeds up the movement of camping players - You can avoid it by teleporting from the top to the bottom while the hazard is in the middle of the level & still moving up (this is very hard to do in practice, also it DOES come back down)


Size: 9.5MB (Includes a few custom textures:D)
Type: Knife & Jail (& sometimes small arms)
Spawns: 14 each for T's and CT's
Author: MaelstroMGooF
Feedback: samgilligan@gmail.com
